summary: The diff implements REQ-2, REQ-3, and REQ-4 correctly. manifest.json, index.html, and sw.js are all updated as required. However, REQ-1 is not satisfied: no actual PNG image files are added to frontend/public/assets/generated/ — the diff shows 0 added files, meaning the icon images themselves are missing from the repository.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate the barn logo images in all required PWA icon sizes (192×192, 512×512, 180×180) and save them as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows 0 added files. No PNG image files (icon-192x192.dim_192x192.png, icon-512x512.dim_512x512.png, apple-touch-icon-180x180.dim_180x180.png) were added to frontend/public/assets/generated/. The manifest, index.html, and sw.js reference these paths, but the actual image assets are absent.
